title: Tech Conference 2024
description: A gathering of industry leaders and innovators discussing the latest trends in technology and software development.

title: Web Development Workshop
description: An interactive workshop covering advanced techniques in modern web development, including React and Node.js.

title: Startup Networking Meetup
description: A networking event for startup founders and tech enthusiasts to share ideas, collaborate, and build connections.

title: UI/UX Design Summit
description: A summit focused on the latest advancements in UI/UX design, featuring talks from leading designers and hands-on sessions.

title: Annual Coding Hackathon
description: A 24-hour coding competition where developers come together to tackle challenging problems and showcase their skills.
